description: You can create and open MSMPL_ALL files using Korg microSAMPLER Editor/Librarian. To create an MSMPL_ALL file, select File → Control Bank Memory... and click Backup . To open an MSMPL_ALL file, select File → Control Bank Memory... , click the "Restore" tab, and select Restore .
The internal storage space in microSAMPLER keyboards can store up to 8 sound banks. MSMPL_ALL files can be used to save all 8 sound banks.
